amendatorysection.para: Asset management company means a business firm or association that, pursuant to a contractual agreement, common-law agency agreement, power of attorney, or other legal authorization, sells, conveys, or otherwise offers an interest in real property that belongs to a (1) bank, savings and loan association, or other financial institution created and regulated pursuant to state or federal law, (2) mortgage-holding entity chartered by Congress, or (3) federal, state, or local governmental entity.
